text: Ion Ciubuc (May 29, 1943 – January 29, 2018) was a Moldovan politician. He was the Prime Minister of Moldova from January 1997 to February 1999. He was born in Hădărăuţi, Romania. Ciubuc died on January 29, 2018 in Chișinău, Moldova at the age of 74.Скончался бывший премьер-министр Молдовы Ион Чубук ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1943 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Moldova
title: Ion Ciubuc
